game.name: BABELOMANIA
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: BABELOMANIA is a technogothic horror adventure, with a visual novel style narrative, point&click puzzles and light survival elements. Arm yourself with your wits, determination, and an open mind... Or lose your humanity, before you lose your life.
